title: Gulf of America Day, 2025
summary: The document is a proclamation by President Donald J. Trump, declaring February 9, 2025, as the inaugural Gulf of America Day. This recognition follows the signing of Executive Order 14172, which renamed the Gulf of Mexico to the Gulf of America, emphasizing its significance as an integral asset to the nation. The proclamation aims to restore American pride and commemorate the renaming, inviting public officials and citizens to observe the day with appropriate activities. This event reflects a broader initiative to honor American history and greatness.
